    • Method Detail

      • checkAsset

        static java.io.File checkAsset(android.content.Context context,
                               java.lang.String dir,
                               java.lang.String fileName)
        Looks for asset "fileName" in "dir" directory. If it's there then returns its File object. If it's not there then copies the asset to dir and returns its File object. If something goes wrong returns null.
        Parameters:
        context -
        dir - target directory on device for this asset to be copied. If the directory doesn't exist it will be created.
        fileName - name of the asset. Same as the name on the device copy.
        Returns:
        a File corresponding to the device version of this asset or null if there's no asset or file found.

      • copyFile

        static void copyFile(java.io.InputStream in,
                     java.io.OutputStream out)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        in - input stream
        out - output stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getBitmapFromAsset

        static android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmapFromAsset(android.content.res.AssetManager mgr,
                                                  java.lang.String path)
        returns a Bitmap object from a picture file asset
        Parameters:
        mgr -
        path -
        Returns:
        Bitmap or null

      • switchImages

        static void switchImages(android.content.Context context,
                         android.widget.ImageView view,
                         java.lang.String imagePath)
        Given an ImageView and an image path on the device inserts the image into the ImageView by crossfading the new image with the ImageView's old image.
        Parameters:
        context -
        view - the destination ImageView
        imagePath - file path to the image
